SELECT USER_LIST_ITEMS_ID,
KIND, USER_ID, TITLE, MS_LIST_ITEM_ID, DISPLAY_ORDER,
DELETE_FLAG, SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO, USER_KEY, RENEW_USER_ID, RENEW_DATE, TS
FROM USER_LIST_ITEMS
WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 0 AND KIND = :KIND AND USER_ID = :USER_ID
ORDER BY TITLE, DISPLAY_ORDER

INSERT INTO USER_LIST_ITEMS( USER_LIST_ITEMS_ID ,
KIND , USER_ID , TITLE , MS_LIST_ITEM_ID , DISPLAY_ORDER ,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( Nextval( 'SEQ_USER_LIST_ITEMS_ID' ),
:KIND, :USER_ID , :TITLE , :MS_LIST_ITEM_ID , :DISPLAY_ORDER ,
:DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE USER_LIST_ITEMS SET KIND = :KIND , USER_ID = :USER_ID , TITLE = :TITLE , MS_LIST_ITEM_ID = :MS_LIST_ITEM_ID , DISPLAY_ORDER = :DISPLAY_ORDER ,
DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE USER_LIST_ITEMS_ID = :USER_LIST_ITEMS_ID AND TS = :TS
